subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
'''On'yomi''':
* {{ja-r|狼咽|ろういん}}: [[cleft palate]]
* {{ja-r|狼烟|ろうえん}}: a [[signal]] [[fire]]
* {{ja-r|狼煙|ろうえん}}: a signal fire
* {{ja-r|狼火|ろうか}}: a signal fire
* {{ja-r|狼牙棒|ろうげぼう}}: a [[wolf's teeth mace]]
* {{ja-r|狼子野心|ろうしやしん}}: [[untamed]]
* {{ja-r|狼藉日|ろうじゃくにち}}: in the [[Onmyōdō]] religion, a day when everything is [[evil]]
* {{ja-r|狼燧|ろうすい}}: a signal fire
* {{ja-r|狼星|ろうせい}}: [[Sirius]], the [[Dog Star]]
* {{ja-r|狼藉|ろうぜき}}: [[disorderly]]; [[violent]]; [[savage]]
* {{ja-r|狼藉者|ろうぜきもの}}: a [[ruffian]]
* {{ja-r|狼瘡|ろうそう}}: {{lb|ja|disease}} [[lupus]]
* {{ja-r|狼毒|ろうどく}}: Japanese [[wolfsbane]], a poisonous perennial of the family [[Thymelaeaceae]]
* {{ja-r|狼狽|ろうばい}}: [[panic]], [[confusion]]
* {{ja-r|狼戻|ろうれい}}: [[disorderly]]; [[violent]]; [[savage]]

'''Kun'yomi''':
* {{ja-r|狼男|おおかみ おとこ}}: a [[wolfman]], a [[werewolf]]
* {{ja-r|狼座|おおかみざ}}: the [[Lupus]] [[constellation]]
* {{ja-r|狼人間|おおかみ にんげん}}: a [[werewolf]]
* {{ja-r|狼弾|おおかみ はじき}}:
* {{ja-r|狼者|おおかみもの}}: a [[brazen]], [[impudent]], or [[cunning]] person

'''Irregular''':
* {{ja-r|狼狽眼|うろたえまなこ}}: [[surprised]] or [[panicked]] [[eye]]s
* {{ja-r|狼狽者|うろたえもの}}: an easily confused person
* {{ja-r|狼牙|みつもとそう}}: a type of [[cinquefoil]], sp. ''[[Potentilla cryptotaeniae]]''
* {{ja-r|狼煙守|のろしまもり}}: a signal fire [[keeper]] or [[tender]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
Noun
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|おおかめ}}

Alteration from ''ōkami'' above. Appears in the {{w|Kamakura period}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
